 untils:nextUntil,prevUntil,parentsUntil
This working example, complete with fully commented code, illustrates one way in which this plugin can be used.
This working example, complete with fully commented code, illustrates one way in which this plugin can be used.
Version: 1.0, Last updated: 11/21/2009

From the selected element(s), get all “next” elements until an “ending” element is reached.
From the selected element(s), get all “parent” elements until an “ending” element is reached.
From the selected element(s), get all “prev” elements until an “ending” element is reached.
Replace text recursively through the DOM, starting at a specific element.
Information about what version or versions of jQuery this plugin has been tested with, and what browsers it has been tested in.
